title: Devilled herrings with green sauce
description: Use any fresh garden herbs for this vibrant sauce, it will taste a little different every time. Less popular herbs such as lovage are also good, but go easy as they can be very strong in flavour.
ingredients: ½ tsp flaked sea salt, plus extra to season
750ml/1⅓ pint sunflower oil, for deep-fat frying
½ lemon, cut into wedges for squeezing
